name: federalize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to include something in a federal system (= one that consists of a group of regions that are controlled by a central government): It was decided that distribution of the vaccine would not be federalised. The government has introduced legislation this week to federalize airport security.
More examplesFewer examplesThere are certain activities and industries that should not be federalised.Her policies included federalizing health care, which was a very controversial subject.The report looks at options for federalizing the immigration system in the most efficient manner.
